actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4017 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 69 - 28. Record Vote Number: 123.

Amendment SA 4017 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S4585-4600; text: CR S4585) To prohibit aliens who are currently outside the United States from participating in the H-2C guestworker visa program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4017 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4017 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 69 - 28. Record Vote Number: 123.

purpose: To prohibit aliens who are currently outside the United States from participating in the H-2C guestworker visa program.
